qas.question: How many feet tall was the proposed statue of Schwarzenegger?
What was the name of the cultural association that wanted to build a Terminator statue?

context: In tribute to Schwarzenegger in 2002, <a1_0>Forum Stadtpark<a1_0/>, a local cultural association, proposed plans to build a 25-meter (<a0_0>82<a0_0/> ft) tall Terminator statue in a park in central Graz. Schwarzenegger reportedly said he was flattered, but thought the money would be better spent on social projects and the Special Olympics.
